text: J. Whyatt Mondesire (October 10, 1949 - October 4, 2015) was an American journalist and civil rights activist. He was a reporter at The Philadelphia Inquirer during the early career. He now owns the Philadelphia Sun newspaper. He was president of the Philadelphia branch of the NAACP for over ten years. Mondesire died in Philadelphia from a brain aneurysm, aged 65.Civil rights leader, journalist Jerry Mondesire dies at 65 ==References== ==Other websites== *Philadelphia NAACP Official Website *The Philadelphia Sun website Category:1949 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from intracranial aneurysm Category:American civil rights activists Category:Journalists from Pennsylvania
title: J. Whyatt Mondesire
